scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -c -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/filter.js -c -m -o build/filter.min.js && rm -f build/filter.zip && zip -j build/filter.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/filter.js build/filter.min.js
